title: Academic Analytics
paragraphs: A business supporting higher education and academic research through data analysis, discovery, and growing connections.
bullets: Collaborated as a software developer intern on a remote, cross-functional team of 9 developers and managers.
Contributed updates to internal software and programatically assembled and analyzed over 500,000 academic articles.
Utilized C#, Python, JavaScript, XLST/XPath, Regular Expression, TFVC, Visual Studio, and other technologies to collaboratively develop internal software and utilities.
